29 #include <sstream>

31 #include "../dist_array.h"

34 namespace TiledArray {
35 
36 namespace detail {
37 
38 inline std::string dummy_annotation(unsigned int DIM) {
39  std::ostringstream oss;
40  if (DIM > 0) oss << "i0";
41  for (unsigned int d = 1; d < DIM; ++d) oss << ",i" << d;
42  return oss.str();
43 }
44 
45 } // namespace detail
46 
47 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
48 inline size_t size(const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
49  // this is the number of tiles
50  if (a.size() > 0) // assuming dense shape
51  return a.trange().elements_range().volume();
52  else
53  return 0;
54 }
55 
56 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
57 inline DistArray<Tile, Policy> copy(const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
58  return a;
59 }
60 
61 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
62 inline void zero(DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
63  const std::string vars =
64  detail::dummy_annotation(a.trange().tiles_range().rank());
65  a(vars) = typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type(0) * a(vars);
66 }
67 
68 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
69 typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type inline minabs_value(
70  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
71  return a(detail::dummy_annotation(a.trange().tiles_range().rank())).abs_min();
72 }
73 
74 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
75 inline typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type maxabs_value(
76  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
77  return a(detail::dummy_annotation(a.trange().tiles_range().rank())).abs_max();
78 }
79 
80 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
81 inline void vec_multiply(DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a1,
82  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a2) {
83  const std::string vars =
84  detail::dummy_annotation(a1.trange().tiles_range().rank());
85  a1(vars) = a1(vars) * a2(vars);
86 }
87 
88 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
89 inline typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type dot_product(
90  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a1, const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a2) {
91  const std::string vars =
92  detail::dummy_annotation(a1.trange().tiles_range().rank());
93  return a1(vars).dot(a2(vars)).get();
94 }
95 
96 template <typename Left, typename Right>
97 inline typename TiledArray::expressions::ExprTrait<Left>::scalar_type dot(
98  const TiledArray::expressions::Expr<Left>& a1,
99  const TiledArray::expressions::Expr<Right>& a2) {
100  static_assert(
101  TiledArray::expressions::is_aliased<Left>::value,
102  "no_alias() expressions are not allowed on the right-hand side of the "
103  "assignment operator.");
104  static_assert(
105  TiledArray::expressions::is_aliased<Right>::value,
106  "no_alias() expressions are not allowed on the right-hand side of the "
107  "assignment operator.");
108  return a1.dot(a2).get();
109 }
110 
111 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
112 inline void scale(
113  DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a,
114  typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type scaling_factor) {
115  const std::string vars =
116  detail::dummy_annotation(a.trange().tiles_range().rank());
117  a(vars) = scaling_factor * a(vars);
118 }
119 
120 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
121 inline void axpy(DistArray<Tile, Policy>& y,
122  typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::element_type a,
123  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& x) {
124  const std::string vars =
125  detail::dummy_annotation(y.trange().tiles_range().rank());
126  y(vars) = y(vars) + a * x(vars);
127 }
128 
129 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
130 inline void assign(DistArray<Tile, Policy>& m1,
131  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& m2) {
132  m1 = m2;
133 }
134 
135 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
136 inline typename DistArray<Tile, Policy>::scalar_type norm2(
137  const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a) {
138  return std::sqrt(a(detail::dummy_annotation(a.trange().tiles_range().rank()))
139  .squared_norm());
140 }
141 
142 template <typename Tile, typename Policy>
143 inline void print(const DistArray<Tile, Policy>& a, const char* label) {
144  std::cout << label << ":\n" << a << "\n";
145 }
146 
147 } // namespace TiledArray
